Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE
REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Relates to the availability of buprenorphine in opioid treatment programs
Summary: Requires all opioid treatment programs to have buprenorphine available for prescription to addicts.
LawCode: Add ยง32.12, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to the availability of buprenorphine in opioid treatment programs
